sentences.en: An item of prominence on the conference agenda was infant health care.
sentences.cn: 会议议程上的一项重要议题是婴儿保健.

sentences.en: Each student makes only one item themselves.
sentences.cn: 每个学生自己只做一项。

sentences.en: Fashion editors drooled over every item.
sentences.cn: 时尚编辑们兴奋地注视着每一件东西。

sentences.en: He opened the cardboard box and took out each item.
sentences.cn: 他打开纸板箱把里面的物品一一拿出来。

sentences.en: I also saw that news item in the Sunday Times.
sentences.cn: 我在《星期日泰晤士报》上也看到了那条新闻。

sentences.en: It's worth checking each item for obvious flaws.
sentences.cn: 有必要逐件检查一下是否有明显的瑕疵。

sentences.en: Leather jeans are the must-have fashion item of the season.
sentences.cn: 皮革牛仔裤是这一季必备的时尚服饰。

sentences.en: luxury items such as exotic spices and perfumes
sentences.cn: 异国香料和香水之类的奢侈品

sentences.en: She and Gino were an item.
sentences.cn: 她和吉诺曾是一对。

sentences.en: the antepenultimate item on the agenda
sentences.cn: 议程的倒数第三项

sentences.en: The menu includes the occasional off-beat item.
sentences.cn: 菜单中包括了偶尔会有的非传统菜肴。

sentences.en: The most valuable item on show will be a Picasso drawing.
sentences.cn: 展览会上最贵重的展品是毕加索的一幅素描。

sentences.en: The next item on the agenda is the publicity budget.
sentences.cn: 议程表上的下一项是宣传预算。

sentences.en: The original 1965 bottle is now a collector’s item (= one of a set of objects people like to collect because they are interesting or valuable ).
sentences.cn: 这瓶1965年生产的原装酒现在是收藏品。

sentences.en: The store is having a sale on furniture and household items.
sentences.cn: 这家商店正在减价出售家具和家居用品。

sentences.en: There was an item in the paper about him.
sentences.cn: 报纸上有一条关于他的报道。

sentences.en: This single item will suffice to typify all the rest.
sentences.cn: 即此一端,可概其余.

sentences.en: We now proceed to the next item on the agenda.
sentences.cn: 我们现在着手讨论下一项议题.

sentences.en: What is your favourite item of clothing?
sentences.cn: 你最喜欢的衣服是哪一件？

sentences.en: What's the next item on the agenda?
sentences.cn: 议程的下一项是什么？

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（两人）建立稳定的爱恋关系（或性关系）
项目分析；题目分析；心理测验项目分析
项目编号；品目号，项目号；产品编号

trans.tran_cn: 条，条款，项目，一则，一件商品（或物品）
trans.tran_en: a single thing, especially one thing in a list, group, or set of things
